showScoreExcerpt: "Wicked, a hideous mess of a musical that wants to be many different things, and rarely succeeds in being any of them. All this from a creative team that, aesthetically speaking, seems barely able to walk and chew gum at the same time."

keyPhrases.quote: rarely succeeds in being any of them
aesthetically speaking, seems barely able to walk and chew gum at the same time

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic uses extremely harsh language ('hideous mess') and attacks both the material and creative team with no redeeming qualities mentioned, indicating an unqualified rejection. | GPT-4o-mini: The review is overwhelmingly negative, describing the musical as a 'hideous mess' and lacking in coherence, leading to a clear rejection of the show.

textIssues: Show title not found in text
rescoreReason: scored on brief excerpt, now has fullText
